name: Swamp Near the Forest
description: You're standing on solid ground in a thin copse of trees. An overgrown path leads to the north into the deep forest. To the south the ground slowly gives way to mud and standing water. The putrid stench of the swamp is thick here.

features.look: It's a path through the long grass and underbrush. It's completely overgrown. It hasn't seen traffic in a long time, except for maybe animals.
